name: Reclaimed Teak with Inset Pinstripes: Wax Warmer
description:
A Penrose Wax Warmer is a perfect way to bring wonderful scents to your home without having an open flame. Inside the beautiful wooden box is a small lamp that heats a porcelain wax melting dish perfect for 1-4 of your favorite Penrose Scented Soy Wax Melts (see soy melt section). Just turn it on and enjoy the aroma for hours!

I build our modern wax warmers in-house completely by hand using reclaimed wood. I make them in small batches of 3-6 pieces at a time. There are only 4 wax warmers of this solid Teak construction with inset pinstripes. The wood is treated with natural linseed oil to protect it, as well as enhance its intricate grain. 

Specifications:
-Wood Type: Reclaimed Teak
-Dimensions: ~4"x4"x3.5"
-Warmer Design Type: 3

Made in Portland, Oregon in December, 2013.

Includes:
-Wax Warmer with In-Line Switch
-White or Black Porcelain Dish
-Bulb

name: Merry Mistletoe: Soy Melts
description: This wonderful blend of blue spruce, frosted cranberries and citrus is sure to make your home smell amazing. This fragrance is infused with Fir, Peppermint, and Cedar Leaf essential oils. Penrose soy wax melts comes with 15 pieces and are made from all natural soy wax. To use, place one or more pieces into your favorite wax melter. Wax can be reused until no more fragrance remains. ~2.5 oz

name: Pineapple Coconut: Soy Melts
description: This fragrance smells like happy hour in Hawaii and I don't even know what happy hour in Hawaii smells like. Notes include Brazilian pineapple, Hawaiian coconut, and a touch of mango. Penrose soy wax melts comes with 15 pieces and are made from all natural soy wax. To use, place one or more pieces into your favorite wax melter. Wax can be reused until no more fragrance remains. ~2.5 oz

name: Midnight Amber: Soy Melts
description: A sophisticated blend of jasmine, musk and sandalwood with a luxurious vanilla finish. A beautifully balanced fragrance is loved by both men and women. Penrose soy wax melts comes with 15 pieces and are made from all natural soy wax. To use, place one or more pieces into your favorite wax melter. Wax can be reused until no more fragrance remains. ~2.5 oz

name: Midnight Amber
description:
A sophisticated blend of jasmine, musk and sandalwood with a luxurious vanilla finish. This beautifully balanced fragrance is loved by both men and women.

Hand poured in Portland, OR in small batches.
11 oz | Burns up to 55 hours | Cotton Wick | Clean & Long Burning 100% soy wax

name: Pomegranate Cider: Soy Melts
description: The smell of hot cider is sure to make any cold night cozy and warm! This fragrance is a true to life apple cider scent with notes of sugar and cloves combined with tangy fresh pomegranate. Perfects for adding a little spice to any fall evening. Penrose soy wax melts comes with 15 pieces and are made from all natural soy wax. To use, place one or more pieces into your favorite wax melter. Wax can be reused until no more fragrance remains. ~2.5 oz

name: White Oak: Wax Warmer
description:
A Penrose Wax Warmer is a perfect way to bring wonderful scents to your home without having an open flame. Inside the beautiful wooden box is a small lamp that heats a porcelain wax melting dish perfect for 1-4 of your favorite Penrose Scented Soy Wax Melts (see soy melt section). Enjoy the aroma for hours!

You are looking at 1 of only 6 wax warmers made from reclaimed native White Oak. White Oak has a long grain pattern, is very hard, has a wonderful light tone and is native to North America. I build our modern wax warmers in-house completely by hand using reclaimed wood. I make them in small batches of 3-6 pieces at a time. The wood is treated with natural linseed oil to protect it, as well as enhance its intricate grain. 

Made in Portland, Oregon in October, 2013.

Includes:
Wax Warmer with In-Line Switch
White or Black Porcelain Dish
Bulb

name: Merry Mistletoe
description: What do you get when you combine the best holiday scents? You get Merry Mistletoe, the ultimate holiday scent! This wonderful blend of blue spruce, frosted cranberries and citrus is sure to make your home smell amazing. This fragrance is infused with Fir, Peppermint, and Cedar Leaf essential oils. Hand poured in Portland, OR in small batches. 11 oz | Burns up to 55 hours | Cotton Wick | Clean & Long Burning 100% soy wax ♻ This candle is poured in a high-quality heavy bottom whiskey glass.

name: Cranberry Marmalade: Soy Melts
description: This scent is excellent for everyday or holidays. A mouth-watering blend of tart cranberries, spiced apples and fresh California orange peel. Infused with cinnamon, clove and orange essential oils. This fragrance is a must have for the fall! Penrose soy wax melts comes with 15 pieces and are made from all natural soy wax. To use, place one or more pieces into your favorite wax melter. Wax can be reused until no more fragrance remains. ~2.5 oz

name: Mediterranean Fig
description: This is a sophisticated blend of fruity and floral scents. It starts out with fruity notes of fresh fig, melon, apple and strawberry. The base is a floral blend of lily, rosewood jasmine and violet. Finished with woody oak and velvety cashmere, this is a sweet but satisfying scent that is complex but does not feel heavy. It works as both a feminine and masculine scent. Hand poured in Portland, OR in small batches. 11 oz | Burns up to 55 hours | Cotton Wick | Clean & Long Burning 100% soy wax ♻ This candle is poured in a high-quality heavy bottom whiskey glass.

You are looking at 1 of only 4 wax warmers made from this amazing Big Leaf Acacia hardwood. Acacia is a very dense hardwood, with an amazing luminescence to its very rich and deep grain patterns. I build our modern wax warmers in-house completely by hand using reclaimed wood. I make them in small batches of 3-6 pieces at a time. name: Cranberry Marmalade
description:
This scent is excellent for everyday or holidays. A mouth-watering blend of tart cranberries, spiced apples and fresh California orange peel. Infused with cinnamon, clove and orange essential oils. This fragrance is a must have for the fall! 

♻ When this candle is finished burning, the glass is easily cleaned and ready for use as a perfect heavy bottomed whiskey glass!

Penrose candles are hand poured in Portland, Oregon with premium all natural soy wax and are intensely scented. Each candle uses an eco friendly wick that will burn beautifully between 50 and 60 hours. To ensure the candles burn as clean and natural as possible, no dyes are added. All candles come with a lid to keep your candle fresh and smelling great.

Candles are 11 oz. 
Burn time 50-60 hours

♻ When this candle is finished burning, the glass is easily cleaned and ready for use as a perfect heavy bottomed whiskey glass!

Each candle uses an eco friendly wick that will burn beautifully between 45 and 60 hours. To ensure the candles burn as clean and natural as possible, no dyes are added. name: Patchouli Cedarwood: Soy Wax Melts
description:
This patchouli scent is a potent and earthy blend of cedarwood, orange and patchouli essential oils. A sophisticated and complex alternative to the common patchouli fragrance.

Penrose soy wax melts comes with 15 pieces (approximately 2.5 oz) and are made from all natural soy wax. To use, place one or more pieces into your favorite wax melter. Wax can be reused until no more fragrance remains. 

2.5 oz

name: Peppermint Bark: Soy Melts
description: This is a true-to-life peppermint bark candy scent that is great all year round. Although this is named after a candy, you'll be delighted by this mellow and not-too-sweet scent. You can truly pick out the warm chocolate and crisp peppermint as the candle burns next to your well deserved bath. Penrose soy wax melts comes with 15 pieces (approximately 2.5 oz) and are made from all natural soy wax. To use, place one or more pieces into your favorite wax melter. Wax can be reused until no more fragrance remains. 2.5 oz

name: Pomegranate Sage: Soy Melts
description: I love this scent after a stressful day! This mildly fruity fragrance has a refreshing tone to it. It includes notes of vibrant green floral, botanical sage, sweet pomegranate and tropical ferns. It would be great with a book on a summer evening or a meal with a friend! Penrose soy wax melts comes with 15 pieces (approximately 2.5 oz) and are made from all natural soy wax. To use, place one or more pieces into your favorite wax melter. Wax can be reused until no more fragrance remains. 2.5 oz
